contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 17, 1896 D Scottish Championship (Second Section)
Scottish Championship (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Scottish Championship scottish-championship-second-section National Championship of Great Britain (Second Section Final)
Scotland
Second
Macbeth [Locke arr. Round]
Waverley Market, Edinburgh 2nd annual contest Sources: The Dundee Courier & Argus (Dundee, Scotland), Monday, October 19, 1896; pg. 4; Issue 13512. The Dundee Courier & Argus (Dundee, Scotland), Friday, August 12, 1898; pg. 6; Issue 14080.
The disqualification of Dunfermline is not listed in the earlier source, leading to a discrepancy in the final placings.
Sept. 13, 2010, 8:51 a.m. Oct. 18, 2016, 8:09 a.m.
1 Crossgates Richard Marsden
2 Lassodie Public James Robinson

4 Broxburn Public Band James Robinson

8 Kilsyth Public Charles Woodcock
9 Wright Memorial John Wotherspoon
10 Longriggend Temperance Frank Mellor

Withdrawn Newhaven Unknown
